content.text: Learn how to create an Image Grid.
content.html: Learn how to create an Image Grid.

content.text: Learn how to create an image gallery that varies between four, two or full-width images with a click of a button:
content.html: Learn how to create an image gallery that varies between four, two or full-width images with a click of a button:

content.code_html:
<div class="row">
  <div class="column">
    <img src="wedding.jpg">
    <img src="rocks.jpg">
    <img src="falls2.jpg">
    <img src="paris.jpg">
    <img src="nature.jpg">
    <img src="mist.jpg">
    <img src="paris.jpg">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
    <img src="underwater.jpg">
    <img src="ocean.jpg">
    <img src="wedding.jpg">
    <img src="mountainskies.jpg">
    <img src="rocks.jpg">
    <img src="underwater.jpg">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
    <img src="wedding.jpg">
    <img src="rocks.jpg">
    <img src="falls2.jpg">
    <img src="paris.jpg">
    <img src="nature.jpg">
    <img src="mist.jpg">
    <img src="paris.jpg">
  </div>
  <div class="column">
    <img src="underwater.jpg">
    <img src="ocean.jpg">
    <img src="wedding.jpg">
    <img src="mountainskies.jpg">
    <img src="rocks.jpg">
    <img src="underwater.jpg">
  </div>
</div>

content.text: Use CSS Flexbox to create the layout:
content.html: Use CSS Flexbox to create the layout:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
.row {  display: flex;  flex-wrap: wrap;  padding: 
  0 4px;}/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */
  .column {  flex: 50%;  padding: 0 4px;}.column 
  img {  margin-top: 8px;  vertical-align: middle;}
/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */

content.code:
.row {  display: flex;  flex-wrap: wrap;  padding:
0 4px;}/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */
.column {  flex: 50%;  padding: 0 4px;}.column
img {  margin-top: 8px;  vertical-align: middle;}

syntax_highlighting.text:
.row {  display: flex;  flex-wrap: wrap;  padding: 
  0 4px;}/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */
  .column {  flex: 50%;  padding: 0 4px;}.column 
  img {  margin-top: 8px;  vertical-align: middle;}
/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */

content.code_html:
.row {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  padding: 0 4px;
}

/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */
.column {
  flex: 50%;
  padding: 0 4px;
}

.column img {
  margin-top: 8px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
.row {  display: flex;  flex-wrap: wrap;  padding: 
  0 4px;}/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */
  .column {  flex: 50%;  padding: 0 4px;}.column 
  img {  margin-top: 8px;  vertical-align: middle;}
/* Create two equal columns that sits next to each other */

content.text: Create a Controllable Grid View Using JavaScript:
content.html: Create a Controllable Grid View Using JavaScript:

content.code:
<button onclick="one()">1</button>
<button onclick="two()">2</button>
<button onclick="four()">4</button>

<script>
// Get the elements with class="column"var elements =
document.getElementsByClassName("column");// Declare a
"loop" variablevar i;// Full-width imagesfunction one() {  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {

elements[i].style.flex = "100%";   }}// Two images side by sidefunction two() {  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {

elements[i].style.flex = "50%";   }}
// Four images side by
sidefunction four() {
for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
elements[i].style.flex = "25%";   }}
</script>
content.code_html:
<button onclick="one()">1</button>
<button onclick="two()">2</button>
<button onclick="four()">4</button>

<script>
// Get the elements with class="column"
var elements = document.getElementsByClassName("column");

// Declare a "loop" variable
var i;

// Full-width images
function one() {
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.flex = "100%";
  }
}

// Two images side by side
function two() {
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.flex = "50%";
  }
}

// Four images side by side
function four() {
  for (i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    elements[i].style.flex = "25%";
  }
}
</script>

content.text: Tip: Go to our Responsive Image Grid Tutorial to learn how to create a responsive image grid, that varies between columns, depending on screen size.
content.html: Tip: Go to our Responsive Image Grid Tutorial to learn how to create a responsive image grid, that varies between columns, depending on screen size.
